author: cms-sw
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmssw#23393

A number of crashes are observed in CMSSW_10_2_DEVEL_X_2018-05-31-2000 after the merge of #23393, there is a huge number of lines added to the output (sorry for missing it during the tests), checking whether the crashes are related to #23393
title: Revert "DD4Hep Shapes Validation"
